name: Ballad of The Masked Bandits
description:
Don The Duster!
Ballad of The Masked Bandits is a puzzle-packed game where you play as three raccoons in a trench coat pulling off wacky wild west heists. Traverse wild west settings, split up or join together as a stack to don the trusty duster disguise as you bamboozle roaming humans, gather tools, and make good your escape! Can you solve the puzzles and avoid getting caught in order to guide these raccoons to fame and fortune?

Meet The Gang Behind The Game!
Ballad of The Masked Bandits is by Big Boot Stoodts, a student collective of eager engineers, artists, and designers from the University of Utah Entertainment Arts & Engineering program.
